# HCPCS

```{r}
hcpcs_search(
  hcpcs    = "39503", 
  state    = "GA", 
  locality = "99",
  mac      = "10212") |> 
  remove_empty(which = c("rows", "cols")) |>
  rowwise() |>
  mutate(descriptions_clinician = map(
    descriptions_clinician, ~paste0("* ", ., collapse = "\n"))) |>
  unnest(cols = descriptions_clinician) |>
  ungroup() |> 
  unite('rbcs', c(rbcs_procedure, rbcs_category, rbcs_subcategory), sep = " ") |>
  case_multproc(mult_proc) |>
  case_global(global) |>
  case_cosurg(surg_co) |>
  case_assistant(surg_asst) |>
  select(HCPCS = hcpcs,
         Description = description, 
         Consumer = description_consumer, 
         Clinician = descriptions_clinician,
         Chapter = chapter,
         Range = range,
         RBCS = rbcs, 
         Status = status,
         MAC = mac,
         State = state,
         Locality = locality,
         Area = area,
         Counties = counties,
         "Work GPCI" = wgpci,
         "Practice GPCI" = pgpci,
         "Malpractice GPCI" = mgpci,
         "Work RVU" = wrvu,
         "Non-Facility Practice RVU" = nprvu,
         "Facility Practice RVU" = fprvu,
         "Malpractice RVU" = mrvu,
         "Conversion Factor" = cf,
         "Total Facility RVU" = frvus,
         "Total Non-Facility RVU" = nrvus,
         "Facility Participating Fee" = fpar,
         "Non-Facility Participating Fee" = npar,
         "Facility Non-Participating Fee" = fnpar,
         "Non-Facility Non-Participating Fee" = nfnpar,
         "Facility Limiting Charge" = flim,
         "Non-Facility Limiting Charge" = nlim,
         "Multiple Procedures" = mproc_description,
         "Global Days" = global_description,
         "Preoperative" = op_pre,
         "Intraoperative" = op_intra,
         "Postoperative" = op_post,
         "Assistant at Surgery" = asst_description,
         "Co-Surgeons" = cosurg_description,
         ) |> 
  case_status(Status) |>
  display_long() |>
  gt(rowname_col = "name") |>
  gt_style(tablign = "right", tabsize = 14)
```


```{r echo=FALSE, eval=FALSE}
hcpcs_search(hcpcs    = "70170", 
             state    = "GA", 
             locality = "01") |> 
  glimpse()
```


# ICD-10-CM

```{r}
icd10cm(code = "F50.82") |> 
  select(Code = code, 
         Description = description, 
         Section = section,
         Number = ch,
         Chapter = chapter, 
         Range = range, 
         Abbreviation = abbrev) |> 
  display_long() |>
  gt(rowname_col = "name") |>
  gt_style(tablign = "right", tabsize = 14)
```
